title: Weektaak Engels Hx week 41. Auxiliary verbs
description: On this website, you can find the weektaak for week 41. You will find an explanation on the auxiliary verbs and some exercises.

items.content:
Dear students,

Right now you are working on your at-home-exercises from week 41 on your studieplanner. This website is part of these exercises. In this website, you will prepare yourself for the following week (week 42).

In this Weektaak we will be discussing the auxiliary verbs.

At first, you will see an explanation, and then some assignments will follow.

Good luck!

In the clip below, you will find an explanation on the auxiliary verbs:

(watch till 5:00)

introduction.body:
In the following multiple-choice questions, there are items where you have to tell whether the statement is correct or not, or you have to choose the right auxiliary verb to fill the sentence.

Good luck!

prompt.body: ............. your sister living in Paris for a while?
What ........ you done to the microwave? It's broken!
I ......... not going to ballet today, I'm exhausted.
............ you see The X-factor last night?
My best friend from Cape Town ............ sent me a letter.

Is the verb "be" the main verb in this sentence?

You must be tired; you have been driving for hours.

Is the verb "go" the main verb in this sentence?

I don't need to go to university today; my professor canceled the class.

Is the verb "is" the auxiliary verb in this sentence?

She is so tired lately.

Is the verb "have" the auxiliary verb in this sentence?

Have you ever eaten crocodile?

Is the verb "are" the auxiliary verb here?

The flowers are beautiful, thank you!

items.content:
Your next assignment will be in your book on page 72; you will find exercise 18.

This exercise is your last assignment, but don't forget to go to the next page on this wikiwijs-page.
